name: lidarr
description: Lidarr is an automated music management and download system. It integrates with download clients and metadata providers to automatically fetch albums or tracks while organizing your local music library.
features: Music Automation: Automatic album downloads, Artist tracking, Release monitoring. Build your music library automatically.
Metadata Management: MusicBrainz integration, Album art, Tag editing. Keep music metadata perfect.
Quality Profiles: Preferred formats, Bitrate selection, Upgrade automation. Get the quality you want.
Integration: Download client support, Notification services, API access. Connect to your media stack.
